con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.project.com/xml/news" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://www.project.com/xml/news" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.project.com/xml/news"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.project.com/xml/news" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="GetNewsByIdRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetNewsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="News" type="tns:news"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="news"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="desc" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="date" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetNewsByIdRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetNewsByIdRequest" name="GetNewsByIdRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetNewsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetNewsResponse" name="GetNewsResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="NewsPort"> <wsdl:operation name="GetNewsById"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetNewsByIdRequest" name="GetNewsByIdRequest"></wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetNews"> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetNewsResponse" name="GetNewsResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="NewsPortSoap11" type="tns:NewsPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetNewsById"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetNewsByIdRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetNews"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:output name="GetNewsResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="NewsPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:NewsPortSoap11" name="NewsPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/service/news"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
